title: Samsung Galaxy A53 coming to the US for $449 w/ four years of major Android updates
content:
After launching the Galaxy S21 FE and Galaxy S22 series earlier this year, Samsung is turning its attention to the US mid-range market. Today, the company revealed that the Galaxy A53 is coming to the US for $449 starting on April 1.

moreâ€¦

The post Samsung Galaxy A53 coming to the US for $449 w/ four years of major Android updates appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has officially announced that the Galaxy A53 5G will go on sale in the United States from March 31 for $449.
